title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\V2\ReadModifyWriteRowRequest
name: ReadModifyWriteRowRequest
description:
Request message for Bigtable.ReadModifyWriteRow.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.v2.ReadModifyWriteRowRequest

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getTableName
methods.description:
The unique name of the table to which the read/modify/write rules should be applied.

Values are of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/tables/<table>.

Generated from protobuf field string table_name = 1;

methods.name: getAppProfileId
methods.description:
This value specifies routing for replication. If not specified, the "default" application profile will be used.

Generated from protobuf field string app_profile_id = 4;

methods.name: getRules
methods.description:
Rules specifying how the specified row's contents are to be transformed into writes. Entries are applied in order, meaning that earlier rules will affect the results of later ones.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.bigtable.v2.ReadModifyWriteRule rules = 3;
